feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.127.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(api): Rate limit for all email-sending endpoints by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3576
  • feat(docs): Support OpenAPI titles for Zod descriptions by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3577
  • improvement(project-templates): Project templates UI improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3578
  • fix(workflow-integrations): microsoft teams scaling issues by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3579
  • feat(ssh-hosts): Add groups to ssh hosts allowed principals by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3535

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.127.1-postgres...infisical/v0.127.2-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.41.2

entry.title: New release for Infisical:
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improvements(org-settings): Refactor Organization Security Settings to SSO Page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3584
  • Fix approval request ordering by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3587
  • Infisical PKI: Subscriber Functionality by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3569
  • misc: updated org delete flow to clear session by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3589
  • feat: added new cache control for index html by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3591
  • lint fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3592
  • feat(secret-sync): OCI Vault by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3567
  • feat(docs): Docs for self approval by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3585
  • feature(project-roles): Project Role Templates by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3570
  • Fixed project roles not being editable in some cases by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3593

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.41.2...infisical/v0.128.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.129.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • improvement(native-integrations): Remove legacy badge/banner from native integrations UI by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3595
  • misc: update custom cert to be crt format for docs by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3599
  • add linux upgrade docs by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3597
  • feature(project/org-roles): Add ability to duplicate org and project roles by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3573
  • feat(machine-identities): oracle cloud machine identity auth by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3574
  • docs(oidc-group-membership-mapping): Add general OIDC group membership mapping documentation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3602
  • feat(secret-sync): Secret Key Schema by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3598
  • fix oci machine identity by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3603
  • misc: add identity support for audit log retention by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3604
  • improvement(oidc-group-membership-mapping): Update OIDC group claims to handle single group string by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.128.0-postgres...infisical/v0.129.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.129.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(docs): Key Schema Tweaks by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3607
  • allow underscores in key schema by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3608
  • feat(org-settings): Option to hide certain products from the sidebar by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3609
  • feat(gateway): gateway support for identities by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3590
  • fix(auth): cli auth bug by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3612
  • improvement(sso-page): Add empty display for SSO general tab if no SSO is enabled by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3610

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.129.0-postgres...infisical/v0.129.1-postgres
